holidays.title: Celebrate Exchange Day
holidays.description: Join us on Celebrate Exchange Day as we honor dedicated souls for their service.

holidays.title: International Whiskey Day
holidays.description: Today is the perfect time for whiskey connoisseurs to unwind with a fine bottle.

holidays.title: Major League Baseball Opening Day
holidays.description: Every year thousands of people call in sick so they can be in the seats when the first pitch is thrown.

holidays.title: Myanmar Armed Forces Day
holidays.description: It is a prominent national holiday in Myanmar, known as Armed Forces Day.

holidays.title: National Acoustic Soul Day
holidays.description: Get your guitar and headphones ready to celebrate this day full of music.

holidays.title: National Joe Day
holidays.description: If your name is Joe then today is your second birthday.

holidays.title: National Medical Science Liaison Awareness and Appreciation Day
holidays.description: We recognize all Medical Science Liaisons from all over the world on this day.

holidays.title: National Viagra Day
holidays.description: Viagra made an impact on the pharmaceutical industry as well as the public’s consciousness.

holidays.title: Quirky Country Music Song Titles Day
holidays.description: A day to appreciate some country music songs with imaginative titles that make you smile.

holidays.title: Scribble Day
holidays.description: Today is all about celebrating the creativity and the art associated with scribbling.

holidays.title: World Theatre Day
holidays.description: A perfect day to celebrate art through music, dance, drama, and enchanting live stage performances!

holidays.title: Quentin Tarantino’s Birthday
holidays.description: Tarantino has been described as the "single most influential director of his generation"

holidays.title: Brenda Song’s Birthday
holidays.description: We’re excited about the milestones Brenda Song is going to reach in the coming years!

holidays.title: Kendra Scott’s Birthday
holidays.description: This award-winning designer is the epitome of hard work that pays off with great dividends!

holidays.title: KennaDee Kay Haddock’s Birthday
holidays.description: KennaDee Kay Haddock, the famous YouTuber, is a part of the “Not Enough Nelsons” YouTube family.

holidays.title: Lalisa Manoban’s Birthday
holidays.description: This fashionable starlet is taking the world by storm, one continent at a time.

holidays.title: Mariah Carey’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Grammy Award winner is referred to as the "Songbird Supreme" by the Guinness World Records.

holidays.title: Vicki Gunvalson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Gunvalson has shown us what a powerful and determined woman can accomplish!
